text: Jasmine Guy (born March 10, 1962) is an American actress, director, singer and dancer. She is best known for playing Whitley Marion Gilbert in the 1987-93 sitcom A Different World. She also played Erica in K.C. Undercover. For her work, Guy was nominated for and won 4 NAACP Image Awards for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series from 1990 to 1993. Guy was born in Boston, but raised in Atlanta. Sources differ on Guy's birthdate. Some sources say she was born in 1962. Other sources mention 1964. ==Filmography== * Cats Don't Dance (1997) ... Sawyer Cat (voice) * Looney Tunes: Back in Action (2003) ...
